name: CardRio
tag_list: mobile, application, location-based, social-network, likes, like, sharing, shopping, crowdsource
overview:
CardRio is a location based social network developed to facilitate users to easily capture and share the things that they like from the offline world with their friends.

It could be anything from a favorite dish, to a beautiful prom dress, or anything under the sun. Every product that is ‘liked’ are being tagged to a location to allow their friends to discover products that they have not seen before, in places that they might not have been before.

Our aim is to make offline shopping more social than it already is.
